resources.string: Effortlessly connect with Parents and discuss the progress of your kid
You\'re not connected to any of your children\'s account. Click the Search icon to search for your child to get started or get started by clicking the Find my child button below
You\'re not connected to any of your classes\' account. Click the Search icon to search for your school to access your classes or get started by clicking the Find my school button below
By signing up, you agree to Celerii\'s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Get the most value out of Celerii by following your school\'s account. Click the Search icon above the home page or the Find your school to get started button below to search for your school.
Get the most value out of Celerii by following your child\'s account. Click the Search icon above the home page or the Find your child to get started button below to search for your child.

We understand that getting used to a new app can be daunting, that\'s why we\'ve prepared special tutorials for you. Use More > Settings > Tutorials to find them or click the See tutorials button below.
